channel.title: Api on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Api on TLDRBins

item.title: curl
item.description: curl # Show header only curl -I <TARGET> # Save as the same name as the file on the server curl <TARGET>/<FILE> -O # GET url-encoded query curl -G --data-urlencode '<QUERY_STRING>' <TARGET> # POST url-encoded data curl --data-urlencode '<DATA>' <TARGET> # PUT a file curl -X PUT <TARGET>/<FILE> -d @<FILE> # PUT a file (Authenticate) curl -X PUT -u '<USER>:<PASSWORD>' <TARGET>/<FILE> -d @<FILE> # PUT a file as raw binary (Preserve newlines and control characters) curl -X PUT <TARGET>/<FILE> --data-binary @<FILE> # POST a file with form param curl -X POST -F '<PARAM>=@<FILE>;type=<APPLICATION_TYPE>;filename=<FILE>' <TARGET> # POST a file in raw-text format (Not as attachment) curl -X POST -F '<PARAM>=<<FILE>' <TARGET> # Not to handle sequences of '/.

item.title: Zabbix
item.description: Zabbix 7.0+ API Check Zabbix Version curl -s <TARGET>/zabbix/api_jsonrpc.php -H 'Content-Type: application/json-rpc' -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"apiinfo.version","params":{},"id":1}' | jq . ┌──(kali㉿kali)-[~] └─$ curl -s http://unrested.htb/zabbix/api_jsonrpc.php -H 'Content-Type: application/json-rpc' -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"apiinfo.version","params":{},"id":1}' | jq . { "jsonrpc": "2.0", "result": "7.0.0", "id": 1 } Authentication curl -s <TARGET>/zabbix/api_jsonrpc.php -H 'Content-Type: application/json-rpc' -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"user.login","params":{"username":"<USER>","password":"<PASSWORD>"},"id":1}' | jq . ┌──(kali㉿kali)-[~] └─$ curl -s http://unrested.htb/zabbix/api_jsonrpc.php -H 'Content-Type: application/json-rpc' -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"user.login","params":{"username":"matthew","password":"96qzn0h2e1k3"},"id":1}' | jq . { "jsonrpc": "2.0", "result": "d983875587424cdbc8d3182166e11580", "id": 1 } Get Users curl -s <TARGET>/zabbix/api_jsonrpc.
